snippet.title: Sorcerer King: Rivals Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
10% off when you buy direct from Stardock: 
http://www.sorcererking.com/store 

Also available on Steam: 
http://store.steampowered.com/app/496730 

Become the Sorcerer King’s ultimate rival and discover a new path to victory: Godhood. With new factions, enemy lieutenants, quests, and more, this standalone expansion adds a host of new features onto the base game and paves the way for even more epic adventures.

----------------------------------------------
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sdsorcererking/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/stardock
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/stardock
